author: Karina Vargas, KOMO News Reporter
title: Texas flood disaster prompts King County to improve flood preparedness
text:
CARNATION, Wash. — In response to the deadly flash floods in Texas, King County leaders are taking proactive measures to prevent a similar disaster.
The King County Flood Control District Board of Supervisors unanimously approved a motion to enhance flood preparedness and community awareness.
This is my worst fear for this community to have flooding like this," said King County Councilmember Reagan Dunn. "To make sure we’re doing everything we can to make sure if something like this were to happen here, that we are the best prepared to handle it.
RELATED: Texas officials defend quick response to flooding as number of missing hits triple-digits
The approved motion calls for a review of the county’s early warning systems, increased community outreach, and the distribution of flood preparedness videos and updated brochures in multiple languages. The initiative aims to improve flood risk reduction and expand educational efforts.
Julia Moreno, a lifelong resident of Carnation, emphasized the importance of preparedness.
"Roads will close, we’ll have to find a new route from work and school, and home, and it's just something you learn to live with, is the flooding," Moreno said. "There could be more preparedness for sure."
Russell Hartwig, another Carnation resident, expressed appreciation for the county's efforts.
ALSO SEE: Texas flooding: 161 people missing in Kerr County as state death toll rises above 100
"I appreciate all the effort the county has put in for flood awareness and flood mitigation, and they’ve done quite a bit of both here," said Hartwig.
King County has faced 29 federally declared flood disasters since 1956, with smaller events occurring nearly every year. Officials stress that the focus is on preparedness, not panic.
Our hearts are with the residents of the Texas Hill Country as they grieve the lives lost and begin the long road to recovery," Dunn said. "Their tragedy is a sobering reminder of the importance of preparedness.
For more information on King County’s flood safety programs, click here.

author: HuffPost
title: Justice Sonia Sotomayor Calls Out Catch-22 In Trump's Immunity Argument
text:
HuffPost Justice Sonia Sotomayor Calls Out Catch-22 In Trump's Immunity Argument Igor Bobic 26 April 2024 at 12:21 am · 3-
Supreme Court Justice Sonia Sotomayor identified a key contradiction underlying former President Donald Trump ’s defense at Thursday’s Supreme Court hearing on whether he is immune from prosecution in a case charging him with plotting to overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election.
The discrepancy lies in Trump’s legal team arguing that presidents can’t be prosecuted for “official acts” committed while in office unless they are both impeached and convicted by the U.S. Congress.
For example, even if a president ordered a military coup or sold nuclear secrets to a foreign power — two hypotheticals posed by Supreme Court Justice Elena Kagan during the hearing — Trump couldn’t be held criminally liable without an act of Congress, his attorney, John Sauer, argued.
Furthermore, Trump’s legal team said that there needs to be a “clear statement” in the statute covering such acts that directly apply to the president. Otherwise, their liability would be moot.
But the liberal justices on the court, including Sotomayor and Ketanji Brown Jackson, pushed back against that line of reasoning aggressively. They noted that it essentially created a Catch-22 by preventing a president from being impeached at all.
“If we say a president can’t be included in a criminal law unless explicitly named, then that would bar the Senate from convicting him for high crimes or misdemeanors because that means that he’s not subject to the law at all,” Sotomayor said.
“If he’s not covered by the criminal law, he can’t be impeached for violating it at all,” she added.
Jackson also said the legal team’s argument “seems completely tautological to me.”
“For us to hold that presidents cannot be prosecuted under any criminal statute without a clear statement from Congress to avoid the question of whether or not the Constitution allows them to be prosecuted, we’d have to have a reason,” she said.
Impeachment doesn’t necessarily require criminal behavior to take place, but Trump’s legal team argued during his January 2020 impeachment trial that only a charged crime can be grounds for impeachment.
The 6-3 conservative majority on the high court, meanwhile, seemed poised to sidestep having to rule on Trump’s claims for absolute immunity by remanding the case to a lower appeals court for additional hearings. They suggested that the court needed more information to determine what is or isn’t an “official act” carried out by a president. Trump’s team has said that his actions in seeking to submit alternate slates of electors were official acts.
“What concerns me is the court of appeals did not get into focused consideration about what acts we’re talking about,” Supreme Court Justice John Roberts said.
A further delay in the proceeding would likely mean that the Department of Justice case against Trump for his unprecedented efforts to overturn an election he lost won’t be heard in court until after the November 2024 presidential election, if at all.
Democrats reacted to the hearing on Thursday with dismay, slamming the Supreme Court for dragging their feet.
“He’s obviously not immune,” Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) wrote in a post on X, formerly Twitter. “SCOTUS is only protecting Trump and slowing his trial. SCOTUS should not have taken this case or frozen the district court. SCOTUS speeds up trials when it wants—but not in this case.”
Related... Supreme Court Conservatives Likely To Give Trump What He Wants In Immunity Case: Further Delay
Supreme Court Seems Skeptical Of Trump's Claim Of Absolute Immunity But Decision's Timing Is Unclear
Trump Rants About 'Presidential Immunity' As Hush Money Trial Begins

author: Jessica Fields
title: 10 Winter Hats That Are As Stylish As They Are Warm
text:
(The Shopping List)
These Cozy Hats Are My Ultimate Winter Weather Accessory
Don’t sleep on these styles.
Despite being an October baby, winter has become my favorite season. Don’t get me wrong, I still like fall. The
vampy makeup, knee boots, and earthy colors are always welcomed come September. But with prolonged summer seasons becoming more the norm, I’m beginning to appreciate the coldest months of the year. The main reason? The fashion, of course. While I enjoy changing up my outerwear looks, it’s the cozy accessories that I’ve come to love most. And at the top of my list are comfy winter hats. No matter what coat I decide on, I’ve found that having a couple of head covers to play with keeps things interesting.
To be fair, I love a good hat regardless of the time of year. But the options for winter just hit differently. Beanies, for example, are one of my go-to cold-weather staples. Yes, they keep my head and ears toasty, but they also come in a
rainbow of colors that instantly brighten any look. Caps of all sorts are another of my seasonal go-to’s. A sporty, wool five-panel never fails me, whether I’m pairing it with a car coat or cropped puffer. Sailer, cabbie, and newsboy styles are also well-beloved and have become a favorite for denim outfits with sweaters and nubby scarves.
Over the years, I’ve grown my collection winter hats and look forward to digging through them all when the weather finally permits. Still, I’m always keeping an eye out for something new. Below are a few of the hat options that are currently on my radar.
Grace Eleyae Everyday Beanie$44I love beanies but they aren’t too kind to my hair. The wooly material can cause breakage, and during a season when I feel my hair is at its most vulnerable, that’s the last thing I need. Enter this satin-lined option. It protects my hair and is Black woman-owned — a winning combo in my book. Free PeopleOver My Ribbed Balaclava$48To be honest, I’m still getting into balaclavas. But this bubblegum knit from Free People has me ready to dive in head first. The looser fit is reminiscent of a scarf, lightly wrapped around the head, and the shoestring-like ties remind me of a cozy hoodie. I can easily see myself pairing it with everything from a bubble coat to fur. Câbleami Boa Aviator Hat In Olive$155There’s something so cool about this trapper hat — the earthy color, the fuzzy ear flaps, and the rustic suede string that keeps them tightly secured. While I can almost guarantee I’d wear it as is, it’s nice to have the option to drop the flaps for some extra warmth.

author: Reuters
title: Libyan leaders agree to form new unified government
text:
FILE PHOTO: Head of the Libyan Presidential Council Mohamed al-Menfi meets Sudan’s Sovereign Council Chief General Abdel Fattah Al-Burhan in Tripoli, Libya, February 26, 2024. Media Office of Libya’s Government of National Unity/Handout via REUTERS/File Photo
BENGHAZI — Three key Libyan leaders said Sunday they had agreed on the “necessity” of forming a new unified government that would supervise long-delayed elections.
A political process to resolve more than a decade of conflict in Libya has been stalled since an election scheduled for December 2021 collapsed amid disputes over the eligibility of the main candidates.
ADVERTISEMENT The leaders are the president of the Presidential Council (PC) Mohamed Menfi, the head of High State Council (HSC) Mohamed Takala, who are both based in Tripoli, and Aguila Saleh, speaker of the House of Representatives (HoR) in Benghazi.
 US GLOBALNATION Magnitude 7.5 earthquake hits near Taiwan, reports Japan agency In a joint statement, the three leaders also called on the UN Mission in Libya and the international community to support their proposals.
They said they had agreed to form a technical committee to “look into controversial points”.
They met in Cairo at the invitation of Arab League Secretary General Ahmed Aboul Gheit.
“The measures that were agreed upon today, we believe, are a very important beginning. They are results that live up to the ambition of Libyans to hold elections,” Menfi told the media after the meeting.
READ: Leader of Libya’s UN-backed gov’t wants to hand over power
Menfi came to power when the Government of National Unity (GNU) under Prime Minister Abdulhamid al-Dbeibah was installed through a UN-backed process in 2021, but the parliament no longer recognizes its legitimacy.
ADVERTISEMENT Dbeibah has vowed not to cede power to a new government without national elections.
The House of Representatives was elected in 2014, while the High State Council was formed as part of a 2015 political agreement and drawn from a parliament elected in 2012.
READ: How Libya’s chaos left its people exposed to deadly flooding
Last week, Central Bank governor Sadiq Kabir wrote to parliament asking it to approve a new unified government and a national budget over GNU extent spending.
International diplomacy to resolve the conflict in Libya has focused on pushing for parliamentary and presidential elections to replace the interim political institutions, including the HoR, HSC, and GNU.
While all major political players in the country have called for elections, many Libyans doubt they genuinely seek a vote that could remove most of them from power.

organizations.name: media office of libya’s government of national unity

author: Thaynara Monteiro
title: Quais competições o Mirassol vai disputar em 2025?
text:
O Mirassol terminou o ano de 2024 com uma grande conquista. Após encerrar a Série B na vice-liderança, garantiu o acesso à elite do futebol brasileiro e disputa a Série A pela primeira vez na história em 2025.
O calendário brasileiro inicia com os Campeonatos Estaduais e, em março, terá o início do Brasileirão. Além disso, alguns times brasileiros disputam as Copas do Brasil e regionais, e competições continentais.
Mirassol em 2024
- O Leão Caipira terminou a Série B do Brasileirão na 2ª posição, conquistando o acesso inédito;
- O time paulista vai atrás do título inédito do Paulistão em 2025;
- A equipe saiu da Série D à Série A em cinco anos.
LEIA MAIS SOBRE O FUTEBOL BRASILEIRO
Quer ficar por dentro do que acontece de mais importante no “Mundo da Bola"!? Então fique ligado no Sambafoot! Siga nossos perfis no [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/sambafoot/), [X (antigo Twitter)](https://twitter.com/Sambafoot) e [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/sambafoot)!
Veja todas as produções audiovisuais Sambafoot! A série documental “Zagallo: Vocês vão ter que me engolir!" já está disponível! Clique no [link](https://www.sambafoot.com/br/videos) e comece a maratonar!
Quais competições o Mirassol irá disputar em 2025?
Após encerrar a Série B do Campeonato Brasileiro na vice-liderança, o Leão Caipira conquistou o acesso e disputa a elite do futebol brasileiro pela primeira vez em 2025.
Em apenas cinco anos, o time da cidade de Mirassol, em São Paulo, foi da Série D à Série A. O clube busca, no próximo ano, a permanência na elite e uma vaga inédita nas competições continentais.
No Campeonato Paulista 2024, o Leão Caipira caiu ainda na fase de grupos, na lanterna da Chave C. Com um elenco reformulado para a Série A, o Mirassol busca o primeiro título da elite do estadual.
Competições do Mirassol em 2025
- Campeonato Paulista;
- Série A do Brasileirão.
Quando começam as disputas das quatro divisões do Campeonato Brasileiro?
Com as modificações no calendário para 2025, a elite nacional deve começar no fim de março. Já as outras três divisões têm início previsto entre a primeira e a segunda semana de abril.
- Série A: 29/03 a 21/12 (38 datas)
- Série B: 05/04 a 22/11 (38 datas)
- Série C: 13/04 a 26/10 (27 datas)
- Série D: 13/04 a 28/09 (24 datas)

title: A50ETF嘉实（562890）跌0.71%，半日成交额1863.88万元|嘉实_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
6月19日，截止午间收盘，A50ETF嘉实（562890）跌0.71%，报1.120元，成交额1863.88万元。A50ETF嘉实（562890）重仓股方面， 贵州茅台 截止午盘涨0.00%， 宁德时代 跌1.13%， 中国平安 跌0.93%， 招商银行 跌0.70%， 美的集团 跌0.65%， 长江电力 跌0.33%， 比亚迪 跌1.40%， 紫金矿业 跌1.44%， 中信证券 跌1.55%， 恒瑞医药 跌0.66%。
A50ETF嘉实（562890）业绩比较基准为中证A50指数收益率，管理人为嘉实基金管理有限公司，基金经理为尚可，成立（2024-03-07）以来回报为12.93%，近一个月回报为-1.76%。

author: IstoÉ News
title: Katy Perry viajará ao espaço em foguete com tripulação feminina
text:
Katy Perry irá viajar ao espaço em uma missão da Blue Origin, empresa de foguetes de Jeff Bezos, dono da Amazon.
O anúncio foi feito pela empresa nesta quinta-feira, 27. A data de lançamento não foi revelada.
A missão é chamada de NS-31, já que será o 31° lançamento do foguete New Shepard, além de ser 11° com passageiros.
Lauren Sánchez, namorada de Bezos, irá acompanhar a cantora. A tripulação da viagem será exclusivamente feminina. Além das duas, a cientista da Nasa Aisha Bowe, a pesquisadora em bioastronáutica Amanda Ngueyn, a jornalista Gayle King e a produtora cinematográfica Kerianne Flynn também serão passageiras do voo.
Elas participarão de um voo suborbital, ou seja, a nave não irá superar a atmosfera terrestre.
